title: OPEC Unlikely To Entertain White House's Output Request: Ellen Wald
itunes:title: OPEC Unlikely To Entertain White House's Output Request: Ellen Wald
description:
Ellen Wald, President of Transversal Consulting and Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council, on oil markets and the White House seeking an OPEC output hike. Akshat Rathi, climate and energy reporter for Bloomberg Green, discusses today’s Bloomberg BIG TAKE: “How to Sell ‘Carbon Neutral’ Fossil Fuel That Doesn’t Exist.” Chris Giamo, Head of Commercial Banking at TD, on the recovery outlook for small business. Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Bloomberg Opinion contributor and Professor of Political Science at Iona College, on Senate Democrats passing a $3.5 trillion blueprint for Biden’s economic agenda. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller (Kailey Leinz filling in for Matt Miller.)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
